item.title: CNN Poll: Americans Divided on Trump's Next Term
item.description: Americans are, according to a CNN poll conducted by SSRS, closely divided on their outlooks for President Trump's second terms.

item.title: Report: Candace Owens Wins 'Antisemite of the Year'
item.description: A watchdog group StopAntisemitism has labeled conservative pundit Candace Owens "Antisemite of the Year," the New York Post reported Sunday.
